meta_text: s taken on the Occasion of an Experiential Teaching we were Granted upon the Text of the ‘Gift of Liberation, Thrust into our Hands’ by our Matchless Lama of Kindness, Lobsang Tubwang Dorje Chang, the Holy Lord, Lobsang Yeshe Tendzin Gyatso Pel Sangpo_DZE SMAD RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN YAR RGYAS (1927-1996)
